document.forum_title: National security expert: Trump saying Obama is the ‘founder of ISIS’ is ‘just plain nuts’ [Video]
document.discussion_title: Ban Ki Moon Visits His 'American Mom' [Video]
document.topic_text: U.N. Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon embraced the 99-year-old woman he calls his "American Mom" on a nostalgic visit to her California home. Ban was 18 when he stayed with Libba Patterson's family in 1962. (Aug. 12)
